title: Trauma, Health and Hazards Center Fund
description: To provide support for the mission, objectives, and operations of the Trauma, Health, & Hazards Center at UCCS, which may include student and faculty clinical and research initiatives.
marketingContent: To provide support for the mission, objectives, and operations of the Trauma, Health, & Hazards Center at UCCS, which may include student and faculty clinical and research initiatives.
